results.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
results.reason: Emphasizes the importance of trusting in God completely.
results.reflection: Trusting in God wholeheartedly leads to guidance and direction in life.

results.text: When I am afraid, I put my trust in you.
results.reason: Shows trusting in God during times of fear and uncertainty.
results.reflection: Trusting in God helps overcome fear and anxiety.

results.text: You keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on you, because he trusts in you.
results.reason: Highlights the connection between trust and experiencing God's peace.
results.reflection: Trusting in God brings about inner peace and stability.

results.text: Commit your way to the Lord; trust in him, and he will act.
results.reason: Encourages entrusting our plans and actions to God.
results.reflection: Trusting in God's timing and plan leads to His faithful intervention.

results.text: Fear of man will prove to be a snare, but whoever trusts in the Lord is kept safe.
results.reason: Compares the danger of fearing others to the safety found in trusting God.
results.reflection: Trusting in God provides true security and protection.
